metadata.description: Contains metadata information related to the performance report data.

platform.description: The platform where the campaign is running

breakdown.description: The breakdown of the performance data

metrics.description: Contains various metrics data related to the performance report of marketers campaigns by platforms.

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions across all metrics

viewConversions.description: The total number of conversions specific to video metrics

spend.description: The total amount spent on the campaign

viewConversionRate.description: The conversion rate specific to video metrics

totalCpa.description: The total cost per acquisition across all metrics

totalSumValue.description: The total sum value across all metrics

sumValue.description: The total value of the performance metrics

viewSumValue.description: The total value of video-specific metrics

totalAverageValue.description: The total average value across all metrics

averageValue.description: The average value of the performance metrics

viewAverageValue.description: The average value of video-specific metrics

totalRoas.description: The total return on ad spend across all metrics

videoReachedFirstQ.description: The number of viewers who reached the first quartile of the video

videoReachedSecondQ.description: The number of viewers who reached the second quartile of the video

videoReachedThirdQ.description: The number of viewers who reached the third quartile of the video

videoReachedCompletion.description: The number of viewers who completed the video

videoViewDuration.description: The total duration of video views

videoAvgViewDuration.description: The average duration of video views

videoPlays.description: The total number of video plays

clicksOnVideo.description: The number of clicks specifically on video content

videoActiveCompletions.description: The total number of video completions

videoActiveCompletionsPercentage.description: The percentage of video completions among active viewers

marketer_id.description: The unique identifier of the marketer associated with the campaign

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign
